firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to support user authentication, case submissions, and public lawyer profiles. It leverages path-based ownership for user accounts and cases to ensure data privacy and security. A new top-level collection, `lawyer_profiles`, has been added to store public information about lawyers. This separation allows for more open read access for all authenticated users on the `lawyer_profiles` collection, while keeping the main `users` collection private to each individual user. This solves the previous issue of being unable to query for a list of all lawyers.
